examples: the house was built on the side of a mountain

definitions.text: an inclined surface connecting two levels
have a tendency or disposition to do or be something; be inclined
examples: She tends to be nervous before her lectures

definitions.text: bend or turn (one's ear) towards a speaker in order to listen well
examples: He inclined his ear to the wise old man

definitions.text: lower or bend (the head or upper body), as in a nod or bow
examples: She inclined her head to the student
She inclines to the view that people should be allowed to expres their religious beliefs

definitions.text: make receptive or willing towards an action or attitude or belief
examples: Their language inclines us to believe them
